snippet.title: Solar Purge Early Access Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Now Available in Early Access on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/931450/Solar_Purge/

Learn more at https://solarpurge.com

Solar Purge is a 4 player couch co-op, sci-fi twin stick shooter with action RPG elements! Blast away everything in your path, find powerful weapons, level up your character skills and discover the secrets of the Nova Genesis system.

Developed by Hitscan Games with Unreal Engine 4 for PC.

Discord: https://discord.gg/solarpurge

Follow us on social media! 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SolarPurge/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SolarPurge
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/solarpurge/

#solarpurge #hitscangames @solarpurge
